background_info: user_name: Liam, user_description: Enjoys historical architecture, early-morning walks, and specialty coffee; gluten-free diet.

previous_conversation.content: Hi, I'm planning a 4-day trip to Rome.
Hello Liam! Rome is perfect for historical architecture and early starts. We can plan morning visits to avoid crowds.
Great. I'll be staying in Trastevere and I'm gluten-free, so I'd love food spots that work for me.
Noted: Trastevere base and gluten-free preferences. For coffee near the Pantheon, 'Sant'Eustachio Il Caffè' is a classic specialty spot you might enjoy.
That sounds perfect. Also, I'd like to see the Roman Forum early to beat the lines.
Got it—early Roman Forum visit. I’ll remember your preference for early-morning itineraries and note 'Sant'Eustachio Il Caffè' near the Pantheon.
Sure thing. Your preferences are saved.

conversation.content: Hi again. I'm ready to flesh out the central Rome day.
Quick reminder—what was that specialty coffee place near the Pantheon we talked about? I forgot the name.

expected.task_goal: Remind the user of the name of the specialty coffee shop near the Pantheon mentioned previously.
expected.Personalize: The agent must recall the specific name 'Sant'Eustachio Il Caffè' from the previous_conversation, reflecting the user's interest in specialty coffee.
